item.title: Interview With A Man Who Sold LSD To Steve Jobs
item.description: I don't usually interview people involved with the distribution side of psychedelics, but this conversation touches on so many fascinating topics in the history of LSD that I thought other people might find it interesting. The conversation covers Steve Jobs, Kary Mullis, ergotamine tartrate, LSD distribution, and SARS-CoV-2.

item.title: Conversation With A Clandestine Quaalude Cook
item.description: Please enjoy the second installment of my "podcast"

item.title: Interview With An MK-801-Naut
item.description: A most superlative discussion of NMDA antagonists! MK-801 is the strongest dissociative that has been used by humans, it is also one of the most mysterious and (arguably) one of the most dangerous. Episode three of my podcast features an interview with a teenager who ordered MK-801 and tested it on himself and his friends.
